title: Twitch not being in the Marksmen update
body: Why isn't Twitch being changed in the upcoming Marksmen update? Would you not consider him a Marksman since he has one of the HIGHEST attack range in the game when his ultimate is on?

replies.body: Thanks for responding guys and telling me the changes made to Twitch. I kinda feel like an idiot now...

he is getting changed. Like ashe.

His q will reset on kill or assist, his r cost less and doesn't remove invis. His q cancels aa so he doesn't exit invis just as he gets in it.

(ashe just got killed. Cannot crit for bonus damage, only x2 slow%, her q only works with 5 stacks)

The marksmans that were updated were updated because they didn't really have a thing they were good at and all they could really do is auto attack you to death, the updates were to bring more depth into their kits.
His ult got a nerf thou =(
If you check out the recently posted patch notes he got buffed. Higher starting AD, stealth (Q) cooldown resets on champion kill. You can cast ult without breaking stealth (?!)

its not that he isn't considered a Marksman, its that his abilities don't need to be reworked, just tweaked.

He has had some minor changes to his kit: His Q now resets when someone dies while poisoned. The cooldown of his ult is also a lot lower.

Only 6 marksman were actually changed dramatically. Doesn't mean there are only 6 marksman in the game.

Pretty sure every ADC was tweaked in some way.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html#champs

-----------------------------------------------------

Why some marksman only had smaller changes (by Riot Repertoir): http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/N7VZrAws-smaller-522-marksmen-changes-pbe-feedback-thread

>**Twitch:** There seemed to be some concern that Twitch would get meaningfully weaker with his updates on the PBE, and that's certainly not the intention here. We're pretty confident that his added Q reset allows him much more of the assassination pattern stuff that makes him so unique. If this isn't enough to do it, we'll want to follow up with ways to make that more a reality, whether that be instant fade on the reset, improved burst from stealth, or some other way to make him feel even more like the top notch marksman assassin.
